name: Grillmeister (Brain Connected)
description:
Submission to: trijam 114 - Smoke without fire

Grill your steaks and place them onto the plate.

Unfortunately, there was not enough time for the grilling mechanic itself.

Controls:

Click onto left plate to create a new steak

Drag steaks with the mouse onto the grill

Drags steaks to the right plate to score points
